reviewText: The More Expressive Sign DVD by Pastor Lynn :Hayden is a wonderful DVD to have and to teach in dance ministry where you could expand creativity in dance with a lot of different vocabulary words to express and different ways to incorporate a dance either solo, group, trio, etc. This is a must have DVD.

So many words and dance moves shown in both the regular American Sign Language and the More Expressive Signs which will help with your creating choreography.  Theres also a complete dance demonstrated step by step with and without music.  Youll going to love this!
It is amazing who we can touch people event deaf people. But must of all, it's a blessing to have creative worship to express our love to HIM and HIS love to his children

This dvd provides numerous amounts of expressive movements and sign movements to worship the Lord in your dance.  It is good to have a broad vocabulary to not only know what to do when you worship but to also explain and show others the movements too, so they can learn

Do you want to enlarge your dance vocabulary? This is the DVD for you. Awesome time learning from the comfort of your home. This video teaches you excellent expressive movements for your own personal collection and for you to have the opportunity to teach these lessons to others. Great, great, great!!
This DVD has a lot of movement ideas and a beautifully choreographed dance to implement in our ministry. Great resource!
What a Great DVD!  Teaches us how to express sign in a greater depth for dancing!  Teaches a complete dance routine for the song "How Great Thou Art"
